      • registerInputCallback

        public boolean registerInputCallback(IInputCallback callback)
        Description copied from interface: IInputRegistration
        Registers the given callback for all types possible. Registration will not be possible if the callback does not implement any supported types.
        Specified by:
        registerInputCallback in interface IInputRegistration
        Returns:
        True if the callback was registered, false if not.

      • registerInputCallback

        public <T extends IInputCallback> boolean registerInputCallback(T callback,
                                                                Class<T> callbackType)
        Description copied from interface: IInputRegistration
        Registers the given callback for the given type, if possible. Registration will not be possible if the callback type is not supported.
        Specified by:
        registerInputCallback in interface IInputRegistration
        Returns:
        True if the callback was registered, false if not.

      • registerInputCallbackOrFail

        public void registerInputCallbackOrFail(IInputCallback callback)
                                 throws InputCallbackException
        Description copied from interface: IInputRegistration
        Registers the given callback if possible. Registration will fail with an exception if the callback does not implement any supported types.
        Specified by:
        registerInputCallbackOrFail in interface IInputRegistration
        Throws:
        InputCallbackException - If the callback type is not supported.

      • unregisterInputCallback

        Returns:
        True if the callback was registered before, false if not.
